text: Increment a python floating point value by the smallest possible amount
I'm using floating point values as dictionary keys.
Occasionally, very occasionally (and perhaps never, but not certainly never), there will be collisions.
I would like to resolve these by incrementing the floating point value by as small an amount as possible.
In C, I would twiddle the bits of the mantissa to achieve this, but I assume that isn't possible in python.
